entry.title: Elon Musk's Tesla Still HODLing $218M in Bitcoin
entry.summary: Despite the bear market and Twitter battle, Tesla remains one of the largest corporate holders of Bitcoin.

entry.title: 2 Venezuelans and 5 Russians Accused of Using Cryptocurrency to Evade Sanctions
entry.summary: The group reportedly facilitated the illegal trade of hundreds of millions of barrels of oil as well as military technology.

entry.title: Sam Bankman-Fried Pitches 'Sanctions, Allowlists and Blacklists' in Crypto
entry.summary: Regulation is inevitable, notes the FTX CEO, but the right approach will make a world of difference.

entry.title: Paradigm Rushes to Defend Ooki DAO in Landmark CFTC Lawsuit
entry.summary: The VC firm lobbied a federal judge to join arguments in a case it believes could “seriously threaten the viability of DAOs.”

entry.title: Draft of 'DeFi Killing' CFTC Bill Has Leaked—Here’s What’s In It
entry.summary: Delphi Labs General Counsel Gabriel Shapiro has uploaded a draft copy of the hotly debated DCCPA, which he says has been “circulating secretly in D.C.”

entry.title: Ethereum NFT Marketplace Blur Launches With Free Airdrop for Traders
entry.summary: Blur is offering rewards for opting-in to creator royalties. Will traders take the bait?

entry.title: gm: Meet the Bored Apes
entry.summary: Bored Ape Yacht Club co-founders Wylie Aronow ("Gordon Goner") and Greg Solano ("Garga") joined Dan Roberts and Kate Irwin on the gm podcast to talk about BAYC parent company Yuga Labs and its size and influence in the space, Ape haters, NFT haters, the SEC investigating Yuga, Buzzfeed "doxxing" Aronow and Solano earlier this year, their vision for the Otherside metaverse realm, and much more. Watch Episode 21 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.

entry.title: Coinbase Backs Grayscale’s Bitcoin ETF Lawsuit Against SEC
entry.summary: Coinbase joins Grayscale in claiming that the SEC is failing to give spot market Bitcoin ETFs fair consideration.

entry.title: Unstoppable Domains Stops Selling .Coin Domains After Realizing They’ve Existed for Years
entry.summary: Emercoin has been offering .coin domains since 2014, so Unstoppable Domains is cutting services to these NFTs and issuing refunds.

entry.title: Helius Raises $3.1M to Make Solana App Building 'Faster and Cheaper'
entry.summary: The infrastructure startup, hailing from former Coinbase and Amazon engineers, built a streamlined Solana development platform.

entry.title: Reddit Users Created 3 Million Crypto Wallets to Scoop Up Polygon NFTs
entry.summary: Reddit generated $350 million in revenue last year and sees about 50 million daily active users.

entry.title: Former Celsius Exec Joins JPMorgan as New Crypto Policy Head
entry.summary: JPMorgan's new executive director of crypto was formerly the head of policy and regulatory affairs of the now-bankrupt crypto lender Celsius.

entry.title: Aptos Token Plummets 40% After APT Airdrop for 'Early Network Participants'
entry.summary: The price of Aptos has crashed more than 40% a day after launch as investors remain wary of the network's widely-panned mainnet rollout.

entry.title: IRS 2022 Tax Guidelines to Treat NFTs as Stablecoins, Cryptocurrencies
entry.summary: New tax guidelines from the IRS mean that NFT holdings fall under the same tax regime as cryptocurrencies and stablecoins.

entry.title: Alleged OneCoin ‘Cryptoqueen’ Associates Face Charges in Germany
entry.summary: Alleged accomplices to Ruja Ignatova’s have been brought to court and charged for their reported role in the Cryptoqueen’s scheme.

entry.title: Berlin Bitcoin Neobank Nuri Shutters Business, Warns Clients to Withdraw Funds
entry.summary: Once a big promise for crypto disruption, Nuri is now out of business as no fresh investment offers arrive.

entry.title: Aptos Blockchain Launches to Concerns Over Tokenomics
entry.summary: Aptos co-founder Mo Shaikh acknowledged the less-than-stellar launch of the Aptos blockchain.

entry.title: Royalties Chaos Shows Ethereum NFT Market 'More Serious' Than Solana: Fidenza Artist Tyler Hobbs
entry.summary: Losing NFT artist royalties would be “a tragedy,” the Art Blocks and QQL artist tells Decrypt, after marketplaces make them optional.

entry.title: Aptos Trading Set to Go Live—Here’s Why Traders May Be Lining Up to Short It
entry.summary: Binance and FTX will both launch perpetual futures contracts, which enable traders to bet against the price of an asset, shortly after APT trading starts tonight.

entry.title: Jack Dorsey-Founded Bluesky Unveils Roadmap for Decentralized Social Networks
entry.summary: The group, formed within Twitter, is building a decentralized protocol that limits corporate and governmental influence on social media platforms.

entry.title: Bored Ape Co-Founders Want Otherside Metaverse to be ‘Web3-Native Roblox’ for Adults
entry.summary: Yuga Labs Co-founder Wylie Aronow says “walled garden” metaverses aren’t innovative—and that Otherside will be different.

entry.title: Bitcoin Miners Are Pivoting in Search of Profits—And Hedging Their Bets
entry.summary: With dismal Bitcoin mining profitability for even the newest rigs available, companies are looking for new ways to stay afloat.

entry.title: What is KYC? How Crypto Exchanges Prevent Money Laundering
entry.summary: Know-your-customer (KYC) requirements are a growing part of Web3, as crypto becomes more integrated with the existing financial system.

entry.title: Europe Set to Roll Out Energy Efficiency Labels for Blockchains
entry.summary: The move could prove beneficial for more environmentally-friendly blockchains that use proof-of-stake, such as Ethereum or Solana.

entry.title: BitKeep Hacker Moves $1M in Binance Coin Through Tornado Cash
entry.summary: An unknown attacker stole $1 million in Binance Coin (BNB) from BitKeep's Token Swap feature and transferred them to Tornado Cash.

entry.title: Terra Co-Founder Do Kwon Developed Crypto Twitter Persona for 'Entertainment Value'
entry.summary: Do Kwon got “carried away” and would spend less time on crypto Twitter if he could do things differently, he said in a new interview.

entry.title: Crypto Twitter Reacts to Chaotic Aptos Launch, APT Token Distribution
entry.summary: Since Aptos' launch yesterday, many took to Twitter to vent about false advertising, lack of transparency, and a huge VC token allocation

entry.title: Bored Ape Yacht Club Founders Talk SEC Investigation and Getting 'Doxxed'
entry.summary: Wylie Aronow and Greg Solano said it's "not that surprising" the SEC would look at NFTs, and that having their identities outed was "bound to happen."

entry.title: Why 137-Year-Old Brand Bicycle is Making Bored Ape NFT Playing Cards
entry.summary: Bicycle will use its Ethereum NFT artwork to sell decks of Ape-branded cards, with plans to collaborate with other owners.

entry.title: Ripple Unveils Latest Recipients of $250 Million NFT Creator Fund
entry.summary: Ripple shows no signs of backing down from its commitment to NFT creators building on the XRP Ledger.

entry.title: SEC, CFTC Launch Probe Into Bankrupt Crypto Fund Three Arrows Capital: Report
entry.summary: The CFTC and the SEC have followed Singapore regulators in investigating the bankrupt hedge fund Three Arrows Capital.

entry.title: Cryptocurrencies Will Play ‘Very important Role’ in Payments Disruption: Walmart CTO
entry.summary: Walmart’s global chief technology officer Suresh Kumar explained how crypto and the metaverse will play key roles in the future of payments.

entry.title: Curve Finance, MakerDAO, and Lido Lead DeFi Token Rally
entry.summary: Prominent DeFi tokens, including Maker, Lido, and Curve, have all led the latest crypto rebound, jumping in price.

entry.title: 'Solana Killer' Aptos Launches Its Highly Anticipated Mainnet
entry.summary: The VC-backed Layer 1 solution was built by Meta alums and touts a novel transaction-ordering algorithm.

entry.title: Solana Founder: We're More 'Complementary' to Ethereum Than 'Killer'
entry.summary: Despite several high-profile hacks, Solana remains a popular rival to the much larger Ethereum.

entry.title: Ethereum Co-Founder Joe Lubin: Today's Metaverse Is Internet Circa 1994, But the Masses Are Coming
entry.summary: The ConsenSys CEO believes augmented and virtual experiences will redefine daily life, despite current technical challenges.

entry.title: SEC vs BAYC? Here’s What Legal Experts Say It Means for NFTs
entry.summary: The SEC is investigating Bored Ape Yacht Club creator Yuga Labs for securities violations. Legal experts say it could have a significant impact on the NFT industry.

entry.title: Ethereum Launches Testnet to Begin Work on Shanghai Upgrade
entry.summary: Developers begin to tweak proposals that may be incorporated into Ethereum’s first major post-merge upgrade.

entry.title: Kanye West to Buy Crypto-Friendly Social Media Platform Parler
entry.summary: Parler made waves in the crypto space when the right-leaning social network launched Donald Trump NFTs.

entry.title: DeFi 'Should Be the Foundation’ of Every Financial Product: Compound’s Robert Leshner
entry.summary: While centralized crypto lenders were collapsing, DeFi worked as it should, making it the “end state for markets,” Robert Leshner argues.

entry.title: Bitcoin Volatility Falls to Two-Year Low as TradFi Markets Wobble
entry.summary: We’re in the upside-down as crypto and traditional markets swap investment roles.

entry.title: Cryptex Is Launching a Token That Tracks the Overall NFT Market Cap
entry.summary: Cryptex CEO Joe Sticco joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about how Cryptex is working with Chainlink and Coinbase Cloud to launch a token that tracks the performance of the entire NFT market and why such an asset might bring new people into NFTs and make the market more accessible.

entry.title: Joe Lubin: How the Ethereum Merge Went, Why ETH Is Down, NFTs, Metaverse, and the 'Killer App'
entry.summary: Ethereum co-founder and ConsenSys CEO Joe Lubin joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts on October 4 for a deep-dive chat on the Ethereum merge and aftermath, what's keeping the crypto market down, why he's super bullish on NFTs and the metaverse, whether it's really a multichain future, and much more.

entry.title: gm: All Things Solana With Anatoly Yakovenko
entry.summary: Solana has had a year of amazing growth—but also multiple network outages. Co-founder Anatoly Yakovenko joined Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott on the gm podcast to talk about the outages, what's next for Solana at its upcoming Breakpoint event, how it competes with Ethereum, how long he expects the bear market to last, what's happening with NFTs on Solana, and much more. Watch Episode 20 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.

entry.title: Decrypt-O's Ep. 3: Where Is Do Kwon?
entry.summary: In this episode of Decrypt-Os, Sander Lutz is back on the street to search for Terra co-founder Do Kwon after Interpol issued a "red notice." His search takes him to the home of a former CIA agent for guidance, and to the place where everyone missing goes to hide out: the mall.

entry.title: The DeFi Governance Conundrum: Synthetix Founder Kain Warwick at SmartCon 2022
entry.summary: Synthetix founder Kain Warwick spoke with Decrypt's Dan Roberts all about DeFi governance and its challenges, his problems with voting platforms like Snapshot, DAO fatigue, regulation and the SEC, and stablecoins onstage at Chainlink SmartCon 2022.

entry.title: How Web3 Data Storage Startup Space and Time Scored Microsoft Investment
entry.summary: Space and Time CEO Nate Holiday joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about Space and Time's data storage business, how it got investment from Microsoft, and why crypto-native businesses are looking for alternatives to big centralized cloud providers.

entry.title: Framework Ventures Co-Founder: 3 Paths for DeFi Investment Right Now
entry.summary: Framework Ventures co-founder Vance Spencer joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about the three paths for DeFi, why crypto VCs are all talking about NFTs and gaming right now, and whether crypto startups should be concerned about regulation.

entry.title: Compound Founder: Stablecoins Have 'Crazy Traction' and Do What Bitcoin Was Expected to Do
entry.summary: Compound founder Robert Leshner joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about the shift Compound has seen in borrowing demands and how it has adjusted accordingly, why he believes stablecoins "will win and conquer everything," and how regulators are approaching the space.

entry.title: Coin Metrics CEO: TradFi Firms Getting Into Crypto Care Most About Mitigating Their Risk
entry.summary: Coin Metrics CEO Tim Rice joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about the blockchain data Coin Metrics gathers, who its customers are, how studying blockchain data can cut down on risk and exposure, and the priorities and concerns of traditional firms that are dipping a toe into crypto.

entry.title: Why Superchief Gallery 'Leaned In Really Hard Really Early' to Displaying NFTs
entry.summary: Superchief Gallery co-founder Ed Zipco joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about Superchief's IRL NFT gallery in L.A., how the gallery updated its tech in 2016 to thin displays to show digital art, and why Zipco believes Superchief "shows digital work the way you'd want to live with it or see it in a museum—not on a phone, not on a laptop."

entry.title: How Armanino Performs Proof of Reserves: Clayton Lowery at SmartCon 2022
entry.summary: Clayton Lowery of Armanino LLP joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about how Armanino conducts its "proof of reserves" audits of crypto lenders like Nexo, how to foresee the next crypto company meltdown, trust in Tether, and scrutiny of stablecoins.

entry.title: OKX's Chengcai Li: 'Theres a Lot of Work to Do' Because Much of Web3 Is Still Powered by Web2
entry.summary: Chengcai Li, head of business development at OKX, joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about OKCoin's rebrand to OKX, dealing with different regulations in different countries, and how centralized exchanges can lead Web3 into its next era.

entry.title: Crypto Policy Crystal Ball: Coinbase, Haun Ventures, and Crypto Council for Innovation at Mainnet 2022
entry.summary: Regulation and policy is going to be the factor that most meaningfully shapes the crypto industry in the next few years. On a panel at Messari Mainnet 2022, Coinbase US policy chief Kara Calvert, Haun Ventures chief policy officer Tomicah Tillemann, and Crypto Council for Innovation CEO Sheila Warren gazed into the policy crystal ball with Decrypt's Dan Roberts.

entry.title: Why NEAR Founder Illia Polosukhin Is Bullish on Sweatcoin and Other Social Dapps
entry.summary: Near Protocol founder Illia Polosukhin joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 to talk about what's being built on Near's blockchain, real-life use cases for DeFi including Sweatcoin, and how crypto continues to help Ukraine, where Polosukhin is from.

entry.title: How DeFi Chain Is 'Bringing DeFi Back to Bitcoin': DeFi Chain Accelerator Founder
entry.summary: Santiago Sabater, founder of DeFi Chain Accelerator, joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 to talk about how DeFi Chain supports smart contracts on a proof-of-stake fork of the Bitcoin blockchain.

entry.title: How Gitcoin Has Given Millions of Dollars in Crypto to Worthy Projects: Azeem Khan at Mainnet 2022
entry.summary: Gitcoin's fundraising and partnerships lead Azeem Khan tells Decrypt's Andrew Hayward and Liam Kelly in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 about how Gitcoin grants work, the importance of community voting, and continuing to give out grants even through the bear market.

entry.title: Synthetix Founder Kain Warwick: Regulation Will Fork DeFi Projects Into Two Camps
entry.summary: Synthetix founder Kain Warwick joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Liam Kelly in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 to give his views on regulation and the SEC, how DeFi projects will split between compliant and non-compliant and that it's "ideologically confusing" but "not necessarily a bad thing."

entry.title: Bringing Institutions to Crypto: Christine Moy of Apollo, David Mercer of LMAX at SALT NY
entry.summary: Christine Moy of Apollo Global, formerly of JPMorgan, and David Mercer of LMAX, joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts onstage at SALT NY for a talk on institutional crypto investing and what hurdles remain to broader adoption amid the crypto bear market.

entry.title: Polygon Studios Metaverse Lead: JPEGs Are 'Not the Future of Web3 and NFTs'
entry.summary: Brian Trunzo, metaverse lead at Polygon Studios, tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 why he's bullish on metaverse fashion, how big brands are thinking about it, why the future of NFTs will be in gaming and not "right-click save JPEGs," and why he doesn't think the visual graphics of the metaverse need to dramatically improve necessarily.
